alt_text: Purple Cloud Mountain Awaken Wine Worm.jpg
img_above_text:
## Purple Cloud Mountain Awaken Wine Worm
Purple Cloud Mountain Awaken Wine Worm
img_below_text:
Make your way to Petalfall Hamlet in Purple Cloud Mountain and run up the path until you reach a large stone gateway. Pass through the gate and turn left immediately upon entering to find a small stone staircase. Go up the stairs to find the Awaken Wine Worm.
## Rakshasa Palace Awaken Wine Worm

img_summary: The image depicts a player character standing near large ceramic jars and a small stone staircase in a rustic, walled area. This setting aligns with the description of Petalfall Hamlet in Purple Cloud Mountain, where players are instructed to ascend the staircase to locate the Awaken Wine Worm. The image serves as a visual guide to help players identify the location and navigate toward the staircase mentioned in the preceding and following text.
